mapper.select: SELECT /* BoardMapper.selectBoardList 게시판 조회 */ A.SEQ , A.CATEGORY , B.CODE_NAME , A.TITLE , A.BODY_TEXT , A.ORIGIN_BOARD_SEQ , A.ORDER_NUM , A.REG_ID , A.REG_DT , DATE_FORMAT(A.CNG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') CNG_DT FROM MAIN_BOARD A , CODE B WHERE A.CATEGORY = B.CODE AND B.CODE_TYPE = 'BOARD' AND A.SEQ = #{seq} AND A.TITLE LIKE #{title} AND A.CATEGORY = #{category} ORDER BY SEQ

SELECT /* BoardMapper.selectBoardView 게시판 상세 조회 */ A.SEQ , A.CATEGORY , B.CODE_NAME , A.TITLE , A.BODY_TEXT , A.ORIGIN_BOARD_SEQ , A.ORDER_NUM , A.REG_ID , DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') REG_DT , A.CNG_DT FROM MAIN_BOARD A , CODE B WHERE A.SEQ = #{seq} AND A.CATEGORY = B.CODE AND B.CODE_TYPE = 'BOARD'
mapper.update: UPDATE MAIN_BOARD SET CATEGORY = #{category}, TITLE = #{title}, BODY_TEXT = #{bodyText}, CNG_DT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() WHERE SEQ = #{seq}
